content: the front and sole pattern the st reductions in the front pattern are repeated 4/6/7 times in total on the soles they are done s 1x in every 3rd 2x in every 2nd round 8 sts on each needle m 1x in every 4th 2x in every 3rd and 3 times in every 2nd round 9 sts on each needle l 1x in every 4th 2x in every 3rd and 3 times in every 2nd round 11 sts on each needle after that you work 1 decrease on each needle in every round front needles 1st and 2nd st / last sts or in the pattern as before on the sole in the pattern as before or 1st and 2nd st/last sts the last cabling on the sole will be done to the center back not stopped 2 sts before when there are 16/20/28 sts left go to the bor with both yarns and fasten the toe with kitchener st done with both strands to prevent „ears work together the first and last side sts as in the rds before weave in ends note to keeping the pattern flexible for the best fit foot length of the sock the charts of the sole are just an example work the socks as you need them and leave the diagonals a little bit more near or far to the center of the sole braiding put the sock on a sockblocker retain the sockblocker with your spare pair of hands your bench vice or a screw clamp if you have to - a nice and heavy sockblocker suffices too now you braid the loose ends please see the videos explaining how to braid is much more complicated for me than doing a 7/10 mohawk style v0 8 braid start with the 4 threads that are nearest to the heel braiding with 4 strands see video https //youtu be/fmm8vwydt50 beginning of the braiding at the sock see videos https //youtu be/- pu__ajrllm short https //youtu be/mhrra1kpdcq long i explain the start with the left side of the heel c2 first i count the strands 1 to 4 from the left to the right side the 4th strand nearest one to the back is put over the 3rd one the 1st under the 2nd one now the numbering changes you cross the new 3rd former 4th under the new 2nd former 1st the first repeat is ready now pull them gently so that they lay straight without pulling the sock too narrow the next 2 threads are added one each to strand 1 and 4 of the braid if that doesn t fit next threads are added to strands 2 and 3 cross the threads before adding to the strands to tighten the gap the next 2 -6 threads are added 1 -3 each to strand 1 and 4 or strands 2 and 3 of the braid as before cross the threads before adding to the strands to tighten the gap you will need more
